sources.title: Break to Freedom
sources.description: Title: Break to Freedom Summary: In 1944, at a POW camp in Germany the Allied prisoners use a dummy prop named Albert to fool the German guards and escape. Directed by: Lewis Gilbert Actors: Anthony Steel, Jack Warner, Robert Beatty Production Company: Angel Productions Release Date: June 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When several escapes at an German pow camp go wrong, the prisoners begin to think, that there is an informer revealing their plans to the enemy. Then Lt Ainsworth, an artist in civvie street, invents a model head of a fictious prisoner, who can take the place of an escaper, when the men march back from the bath house, which is situated outside the camp.
